### Request for Proposal (RFP) for Human Resources (HR) Professional Services
#### Solicitation Number: 100021234

The Solicitation Number [100021234] advertises a request for proposal (RFP) for human resources (HR) professional services. The Government of Canada seeks a contractor to provide HR services to support the needs of Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC).

**Services Required:**

*   Testing and assessment services in the context of recruitment and talent sourcing, including the development of competency-based assessment tools and methodologies.
*   Professional services in a range of HR disciplines, including HR Consultant Senior Level, Staffing Consultant Senior Level, and Organizational Design and Classification Consultant Senior Level.

**Security Requirements:**
Bidders must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) at the Protected B level and have Personnel requiring access to protected information, assets, or work sites hold a valid reliability status granted or approved by the Contract Security Program (CSP).

**Duration and Framework:**
The proposed contract duration is one year plus two one-year irrevocable options, with the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) method of supply subject to quarterly refresh cycles.

**Eligibility:**
The tender is open to those Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who do not qualify for Tier 1 for at least one of the categories listed:

*   Senior HR Consultant
*   Senior Staffing Consultant
*   Senior Organizational Design and Classification Consultant
*   Senior Leadership Development Consultant
*   Senior HR Assistant Consultant
Invitations to submit a proposal under this solicitation are limited to parties who are pre-qualified for these activities and services.

Please refer to the attached pre-qualification instructions or contact SPTS.TSPS@TPSGC-PWGSC.GC.CA if more information is needed.
